document_data.name: Rain Bird Rooming House
document_data.mainbody: '''Rain Bird Rooming House''' was an inn in [[Waterdeep]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Interior: One of the doors in the kitchens had a peeling figure of a wizard, painted blue. This door was actually a ''[[portal]]'' of sorts.
document_data.History: In the early spring of {{yearlink|1373}}, [[Elminster Aumar]] walked out of the portal with the peeling blue paint, and conversed briefly with his old friend, [[Phaerorn]], telling him the news about his son in [[Suzail]]. Phaerorn then explained to his scullery boy, [[Naviskurr]], that the man was actually Elminster and that was why nothing should block that door; Naviskurr fainted after Elminster left.
